channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Faulty manhole cover causing too much noise, 28th November
item.description:
Hi there, I wanted to report a faulty manhole cover outside my house. It appears to be loose or damaged, and every time cars drive over it, it makes a very loud banging noise. Because the road is a main road, the traffic is quite frequent, and the noise occurs constantly throughout the day and night. It has become especially difficult at night, as the repeated noise is causing sleepless nights and significant disturbance. Could this please be looked into as soon as possible? It would make a huge difference to the noise levels and overall comfort in the area. Thank you for your help.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Caledonian Road, Barnsbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
